title.rendered: Tourism for Future project completed training module I ‘ Sustainable Effective Management and Eco-Development System” – Peja

content.rendered:
Tourism for Future project completed training module I ' Sustainable Effective Management and Eco-Development System" - Peja

Tourism for Future project completed training module I ‘ Sustainable Effective Management and Eco-Development System” – Peja. This training module is designed to explain the concept of sustainability, introduces the impact of tourism, equip participants with the knowledge and skills necessary to lead and manage organizations in a way that promotes sustainability, minimizes environmental impact, and maximizes economic and social benefits. Learn to integrate sustainable practices and eco-development systems into your management approach and contribute to a more environmentally conscious and prosperous future.
